name: part_000
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】Hoshimachi Suisei 日本武道館 Live ＂SuperNova＂ [_o_mtN68KEg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening splash screen for Hoshimachi Suisei's Budokan Live "SuperNova" with concert rules and start notice.
Attention screen providing safety instructions regarding flashing lights and cheering etiquette.
Promotional graphic announcing the second sale of live concert merchandise.
Extended montage sequence showcasing a collage of fan messages and illustrations celebrating the live event.

subtitles.original: 開演までしばらくお待ちください
subtitles.english: The concert will be starting soon.

subtitles.original: 録音、録画、SNSへの動画や音声アップロードは固くお断りいたします
subtitles.english: Audio / video recordings and illegal uploads are strictly prohibited.

subtitles.original: スクリーンショットをSNSにアップロードは拡散OK!
subtitles.english: Sharing screenshots on social media is OK!

subtitles.original: 演出の都合上、照明の点滅にご注意ください
subtitles.english: Please be aware of flashing lights during the performance.

subtitles.original: 2025.2.1 21:30~ ライブグッズ 2次販売開始
